creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three-panel huipil, broad white and red striped ground, red stripes have very fine interior warp stripes in yellow and magenta?; shoulder area is primarily red, with fine weft stripes in yellow and supplementary weft patterning in blue, purple, yellow, orange and green; pattern consists of geometric motifs, chevrons, etc.; embroidered neck-hole and arm-holes.
medium: Cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
